item.title: Beth add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Be the change that you wish to see in the world." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Beth add a quote by Johann Wolfgang von Goethe
item.description: "Whatever you can do or dream you can, begin it. Boldness has genius, power and magic in it!" -- Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

item.title: Beth add a quote by Eleanor Roosevelt
item.description: "The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams." -- Eleanor Roosevelt

item.title: Beth add a quote by Leonardo da Vinci
item.description: "Simplicity is the ultimate sophistication." -- Leonardo da Vinci

item.title: Beth add a quote by Shunryu Suzuki
item.description: "If your mind is empty, it is always ready for anything, it is open to everything. In the beginner's mind there are many possibilities, but in the expert's mind there are few. " -- Shunryu Suzuki

item.title: Beth add a quote by Seth Godin
item.description: "If you can’t state your position in eight words, you don’t have a position. " -- Seth Godin

item.title: Beth add a quote by Seth Godin
item.description: "Change almost never fails because it's too early. It almost always fails because it's too late." -- Seth Godin

item.title: Beth add a quote by Ken Robinson
item.description: "If you're not prepared to be wrong, you'll never come up with anything original." -- Ken Robinson

item.title: Beth add a quote by Ester Buchholz
item.description: "Others inspire us, information feeds us, practice improves our performance, but we need quiet time to figure things out, to emerge with new discoveries, to unearth original answers." -- Ester Buchholz

item.title: Beth add a quote by Rollo May
item.description: "In order to be open to creativity, one must have the capacity for constructive use of solitude. One must overcome the fear of being alone." -- Rollo May

item.title: Beth add a quote by Henry David Thoreau
item.description: "Our life is frittered away by detail. Simplify, simplify." -- Henry David Thoreau

item.title: Beth add a quote by John F. Kennedy
item.description:
"Change is the law of life. And those who look only to the past or the present are certain to miss the future.
<i>[Address in the Assembly Hall at the Paulskirche in Frankfurt, June 26 1963]</i>" -- John F. Kennedy

item.title: Beth add a quote by Lao Tsu
item.description: "Those who know do not speak. Those who speak do not know." -- Lao Tsu

item.title: Beth add a quote by Daisetz Teitaro Suzuki
item.description: "Emptiness which is conceptually liable to be mistaken for sheer nothingness is in fact the reservoir of infinite possibilities." -- Daisetz Teitaro Suzuki

item.title: Beth add a quote by David Bader
item.description: "Be here now. Be someplace else later. Is that so complicated?" -- David Bader

item.title: Beth add a quote by Siddhārtha Gautama
item.description: "Whatever a monk keeps pursuing with his thinking and pondering, that becomes the inclination of his awareness." -- Siddhārtha Gautama
